mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lesson (lesson_name, lesson_introduced, reward_star, unlock_star, unlock_cost, course_id, subject_id, course_name, subject_name,create_at) VALUES (#{lessonName},#{lessonIntroduced},#{rewardStar},#{unlockStar},#{unlockCost},#{courseId},#{subjectId},#{courseName},#{subjectName},#{createAt})
mapper.select: SELECT l.id,l.lesson_name,l.subject_name,l.course_name,l.lesson_status FROM lesson AS l INNER JOIN student_lesson_datum AS sld ON l.id = sld.class_id WHERE sld.student_id = #{studentId} AND sld.enshrine = 1
